channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vanguard’s Former OCIO Clients Must Stand Their Ground
item.description: Vanguard's OCIO clients should be wary of the higher-fee active funds and alternative investments that are now open to them.

item.title: What credit score do you need to buy a house?
item.description: Mortgage lenders use specific credit scores—here are the minimum scores you need for a variety of mortgage types.

item.title: Are Your Data Governance and Management Practices Keeping Pace with the AI Boom?
item.description: No matter how sophisticated and expensive a firm's AI tools are, it should not forget that the principle “garbage in, garbage out” (GIGO) applies to the entire investment management process.

item.title: Fourth of July traffic will be record-setting. Here’s how to avoid the traffic jams
item.description: Nearly 71 million people will be traveling.

item.title: Book Review: Default
item.description: Argentina’s debt restructuring tests the theoretical limits of chaos theory. Gregory Makoff's feat is to build his narrative as a thriller without losing the detailed facts valued by specialists.

item.title: Looking for the coming tide of economic growth? Start here
item.description: As the world ages, businesses need to seize the potential of older workers and consumers.

item.title: Conundrum Cubed: Scope 3 for Financials
item.description: Proxy data and estimates are likely to play an important role in plugging disclosure gaps in financial institutions' Scope 3 emissions.

item.title: Elon Musk vows Bill Gates will be ‘obliterated’ if he doesn’t stop shorting Tesla
item.description: If the Optimus robot somehow catapults Tesla to Musk’s $30 trillion market cap target, bears like the Microsoft cofounder could be wiped out—but that is a big if.

item.title: Hedge Funds: A Poor Choice for Most Long-Term Investors?
item.description: By allocating to a diversified pool of hedge funds, many institutional investors are unwittingly reducing their equity holdings.

item.title: Paramount merger with Skydance back on under new terms following collapse of talks
item.description: National Amusements, the family company that controls Paramount, will refer the deal to a special committee of Paramount directors for review.
